text: Mara'iyama-tanaya ‘isa balalena, ‘he allah‌ amadera raba! Amadera jan'ya asamana theke khadyapurna khanca pathana; eta amadera o amadera purbabarti o parabarti sabara jan'ya habe anandotsaba sbarupa ebam apanara kacha theke nidarsana.Ara amadera jibika dana karuna; apani'i to srestha jibikadata.’
